entry.title: A Cup of Warmth
entry.summary:
Author: adriensitos

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,969Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: Bruce Wayne begins to crumble under the weight, the guilt, and the constant doubt of whether he’s truly enough as a vigilante. The city needs him… but he’s no longer sure he has anything left to give. There’s chocolate, gentleness, care—there’s a soft light only Clark knows how to bring. And for the first time in a long while, Bruce allows himself to speak… and to be held.

entry.title: Seven minutes in heaven
entry.summary:
Author: NightWrites_leaf

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 197,062Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 480

Summary: Dick Grayson thought it would be harmless, one chill night where the Young Justice crew and the Titans could actually relax together. No missions. No explosions. Just friends, laughter… and maybe a little too much alcohol. But when a round of Never Have I Ever spirals into Seven Minutes in Heaven, Dick and Wally find themselves a little too close in the dark — and suddenly, nothing feels simple anymore. Or;Wally and Dick’s developing relationship, full of tension, tenderness, and the two of them absolutely failing to keep their hands to themselves.

entry.title: Do I Wanna Know?
entry.summary:
Author: Deluv_011

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 29,051Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 219

Summary: Damian Wayne and Conner Kent form an unexpected couple. However, few knew that behind that façade, each of them had their heart burning for someone else. Thus, Damian and Conner cling to each other as a distorted reflection of what they truly long for. Damian yearns for Jon Kent. Conner pines for Tim Drake. And the deeper they fall into that strange relationship, the more they begin to notice certain glances among their teammates… glances that reveal far more than mere friendship.

entry.title: Cats and Dogs
entry.summary:
Author: riversiders

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,053Chapters: 8/16Kudos: 169

Summary: It's not that he doesn't like Clark. He’s obsessed with Clark, actually, and not just because he somehow conned his way into dating him. As suspicious and crazy as it makes Bruce feel, he cannot deny that Clark cares. He’s constantly checking in on Bruce. They talk on the phone practically every day, and Superman has become a frequent and regular visitor at Wayne Manor. Dick adores him. Alfred does too. He keeps making hints about ‘letting Mr. Kent into the club in an official capacity’. Clark is wonderful. He is good—too good. He won't treat Bruce the way Bruce wants to be treated.

entry.title: The Agony And The Ecstasy
entry.summary:
Author: Burntbowlofrice

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,210Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 26

Summary: Forewarning: I don't know much of canon, it's been a while, and the first chapter is heavy for information and setting instead of development.The Marvel universe is grateful for her heroes saving her the first time, but the trauma she's gathered is too much for her to continue on for much longer. With the last of her power, she detaches some of her heroes from her own self to save them before the collapse of everything they've ever known.Now in Gotham, Tony and Peter salvage together a life, ready to take down enemies and play by this new world's rules for now. But the further into this world they get, the more accepting they are to their situation, and the more friends they find and make along the way.If anyone has any suggestions of what I need to correct, canon, grammar, or punctuation wise, feel free to comment.

entry.title: Miss the Mark
entry.summary:
Author: elihinata

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,160Chapters: 1/6Kudos: 40

Summary: All his life, Clark Kent felt like an outsider. Forbidden from a normal childhood to protect his secret, he learned early what it meant to be different, to blend in a crowd without actually fitting in. But the deepest cut came when he discovered the one thing his Kryptonian biology denied him: a soulmate. While every human carried a mark destined for another, Clark was all alone—a fact that bothered him more with every passing year. It was a loneliness so sharp, so desperate, that it finally drove him to an unthinkable act of impulse. Clark Kent, absolutely miserable and heartsick, ended up kissing his best friend, Bruce Wayne. Or, the universe has a lot in store for an emotionally constipated furry and a lonely alien.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 69,110Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 167

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.

entry.title: Dark Days and Lost Suns
entry.summary:
Author: Athena_Faymont

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,257Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 75

Summary: Clark admires Batman, the man who has given up civilian life to protect everyone else's, the tough, sharp, and compassionate man. Bruce admires Superman, the alien who, despite being able to dominate them all by force, has decided to take care of a planet that isn't his own.And, even with these two flawed principles, neither of them can imagine how alone the other feels... and how alone they themselves are. This is a long story, the superbat fanfic I've always wanted to write about how, within the canon, one day something changes and they find each other. If you want to join me on this adventure, we'll be here every Friday. [Puedes encontrarlo en español en mi perfil.]
